name: Artificial Intelligence and Data Science
description: AI & Data Science program with industry-aligned curriculum to solve real-world problems.
fullDescription: The B.Tech in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science, established in 2020, focuses on building data-driven solutions and strong communication skills. The department provides well-equipped labs, multi-modal teaching, and expert faculty to shape AI professionals.

name: Computer Science and Business Systems
description: Combines computer science with business systems to build software solutions for business problems.
fullDescription: CSBS aims to provide strong teaching and learning in business systems and foster innovative thinking for business product design. Students get practical exposure to current industry trends and opportunities to build interdisciplinary software products.

name: Computer Science and Engineering
description: CSE department focusing on software, algorithms, and computing foundations.
fullDescription: Established in 1999, the CSE department has grown from 60 to 180 intake and is NBA accredited. It emphasizes rigorous academics, research, and industry collaboration, preparing students for careers in software and research.

name: Information Technology
description: IT department with a research orientation and industry-linked projects.
fullDescription: The IT department supports research initiatives and has received project funding. It offers hands-on labs and industry-relevant curriculum to prepare students for IT careers.

name: Electronics and Communication Engineering
description: ECE department offering strong VLSI and communication programs with research grants.
fullDescription: Founded in 2000, ECE offers UG and PG (M.E. VLSI Design) and has received DST FIST grants. The department is NBA accredited and functions as a recognized research center with strong industry linkages.

name: Mechanical Engineering
description: Mechanical Engineering with well-furnished labs and a focus on research and teaching.
fullDescription: Started in 2006, the Mechanical department has grown to a larger intake and is NBA accredited. It emphasizes practical lab work, research, and preparing students for industry roles.

name: Bio Medical Engineering
description: BME department focused on biomedical tech and lab-based research.
fullDescription: Established in 2007, BME is NBA accredited and equipped with state-of-the-art laboratories. The department conducts workshops and supports research aiming to serve industry and society constructively.
